translation.en: [Arin] It seems strange now,
translation.zh: 这感觉有些陌生了 乐高 幻影忍者：神龙崛起

translation.en: but remember when Ninjago was the only thing on the map?
translation.zh: 忍者王国曾是地图上唯一的存在 大融合：上集

translation.en: When it was our entire world?
translation.zh: 那时它是我们的全世界

translation.en: I used to spend all my time trying to be like my heroes, the Ninja.
translation.zh: 我希望自己能成为像忍者那样的英雄

translation.en: Practicing their moves, learning their poses...
translation.zh: 练习他们的动作 研究他们的招式

translation.en: I wanted to be just like them.
translation.zh: 我想变得和他们一样

translation.en: To protect everyone in Ninjago.
translation.zh: 保护忍者王国的每一个人

translation.en: To ride dragons into adventure and mythical realms.
translation.zh: 乘着巨龙在神话国度自由翱翔

translation.en: Mysterious lands that could only exist in legend.
translation.zh: 探索仅存于传说中的神秘大陆

translation.en: But I quickly found out those legendary realms
translation.zh: 但我很快就发现 那些传说中的国度全都是真实的

translation.en: are very real.
translation.zh: 那些传说中的国度全都是真实的

translation.en: And I was about to lose everyone that was important to me.
translation.zh: 而我即将失去身边每一个重要的人

translation.en: My neighborhood must have been the very center of "The Merge."
translation.zh: 我的家园处于〝大融合〞的核心地带

translation.en: But back then, we didn't know what to call it.
translation.zh:
只不过当时
我们并不知道该如何称呼它

translation.en: -[screaming] -[Arin] It was just chaos.
translation.zh: 周围一片混沌

translation.en: Arin, get inside! It's too dangerous out there!
translation.zh: 阿林 你快进来 外面太危险了

translation.en: -Arin! -[screaming continues]
translation.zh: 阿林

translation.en: [Arin] That's when my heroes, the Ninja, arrived!
translation.zh: 就在这时 忍者出现了

translation.en: We were in so much danger, but I couldn't help but be excited.
translation.zh: 虽然当时十分危险 可我还是很激动

translation.en: Hey, kid, you get lost?
translation.zh: 嘿 孩子 你走丢了吗？

translation.en: [Arin] Jay, the Lightning Ninja!
translation.zh: 杰 电系忍者

translation.en: Kai, Fire Ninja!
translation.zh: 凯 火系忍者

translation.en: Cole, Earth Ninja!
translation.zh: 寇 土系忍者

translation.en: Zane, Ice Ninja.
translation.zh: 赞 冰系忍者

translation.en: Nya, Water Ninja!
translation.zh: 妮雅 水系忍者

translation.en: Lloyd, the Legendary Green Ninja!
translation.zh: 劳埃德 传说中的绿色忍者

translation.en: [Lloyd] Hold on, kid.
translation.zh: 抓紧了 孩子

translation.en: Green Ninja, my parents are in that storm!
translation.zh: 绿色忍者 我父母还在风暴里

translation.en: You gotta save them!
translation.zh: 你要救救他们

translation.en: [Lloyd] That's what we're here for!
translation.zh: 我们就是为这个来的

translation.en: [Arin] And that's when it happened.
translation.zh: 下一秒 一切都变了

translation.en: As I saw my small neighborhood disappear
translation.zh: 当我看到我家消失不见

translation.en: and a new city show up on the horizon,
translation.zh: 一座新城市拔地而起的时候

translation.en: I realized I had witnessed "The Merge" firsthand.
translation.zh: 我意识到自己亲眼见证了〝大融合〞

translation.en: The moment all the mysterious realms
translation.zh: 那一刻 所有传说中的神秘国度

translation.en: I had only heard about, merged with Ninjago,
translation.zh: 和忍者王国融合在了一起

translation.en: for reasons no one's been able to figure out.
translation.zh: 没人知道这到底是为什么

translation.en: I survived,
translation.zh: 我幸存了下来

translation.en: but I was alone.
translation.zh: 却孤单一人

translation.en: My parents and everyone I ever knew had vanished.
translation.zh: 我父母和所有我认识的人都消失了

translation.en: [Arin] Mom? Dad?
translation.zh: 妈妈 爸爸

translation.en: With my parents and home gone,
translation.zh: 我的父母和家园都不见了

translation.en: I had to make a new life for myself.
translation.zh: 我必须想办法活下去

translation.en: Before, everyone I knew looked like me.
translation.zh: 从前 我生活得无忧无虑

translation.en: Now I walk the streets with skeleton people,
translation.zh: 可现在我和骷髅人走在大街上

translation.en: buy food from snail people,
translation.zh: 从蜗牛人那里买吃的

translation.en: sell pies to frog people!
translation.zh: 还把馅饼卖给青蛙人

translation.en: And since the Ninja disappeared,
translation.zh: 自从忍者们消失后

translation.en: I realized it's up to me
translation.zh: 我意识到 自己必须将他们的遗志继承下去

translation.en: to carry on their legendary tradition.
translation.zh: 自己必须将他们的遗志继承下去

translation.en: Arin, not to insult the dreams of my best new friend, but...
translation.zh:
阿林 我并不想打击
我好朋友的梦想 不过...

translation.en: you are so not a Ninja.
translation.zh: 你和忍者八竿子打不着

translation.en: [Arin sighs] How would you know, Sora?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道 索拉？

translation.en: You didn't grow up with them like I did.
translation.zh: 我从小听着他们故事长大

translation.en: All I need is a master to train me.
translation.zh: 我只需要有个大师来训练我

translation.en: Sure! Ah, one problem.
translation.zh: 好啊 有个问题

translation.en: There are no Ninja Masters around anymore.
translation.zh: 这里再也没有什么忍者大师了

translation.en: [Arin] Hey, have you found what we need yet?
translation.zh: 嘿 还没找到我们要的零件吗？

translation.en: I can only distract these dogs from making noise for so long.
translation.zh:
我快拖不住这几只狗了
它们要大声叫了

translation.en: Uh, I don't have that many stories to tell.
translation.zh: 我已经把能讲的故事都讲完了

translation.en: Give me a second.
translation.zh: 给我点时间

translation.en: Boom! And we didn't even set off the...
translation.zh: 我们都还没有触发警...

translation.en: [security robots] Halt! Halt! Halt!
translation.zh: 站住

translation.en: [Arin] We should probably leave right about now.
translation.zh: 我想我们该离开这里了

translation.en: I always like how you think.
translation.zh: 每次我们的意见都很一致

translation.en: [Arin] Oh, there's gotta be an easier way to get mechanical parts!
translation.zh:
一定有更简单的办法
能找到机械零件

translation.en: There is. It's called "having money."
translation.zh: 有啊 有钱就可以买到

translation.en: Which is not exactly our situation.
translation.zh: 可惜我们俩最缺的就是钱

translation.en: [Arin] After tomorrow it might be!
translation.zh: 过了今天可能就有了

translation.en: [security robots] Halt! Halt! Halt!
translation.zh: 站住

translation.en: [Arin] All right, then. Ninja...
translation.zh: 不打不行了 忍者...

translation.en: -You're not a ninja. -[Arin] Wannabe Ninja...
translation.zh: 你不是忍者 见习忍者出击

translation.en: Rough landing. But you're getting better at that.
translation.zh:
落地不怎么样
不过你越来越有进步了

translation.en: -[Arin grunts] -Let's go!
translation.zh: 我们走

translation.en: [grunts] Can you make a distraction?
translation.zh: 你能分散他们注意力吗？

translation.en: I don't think these bots want to hear my story about the Merge.
translation.zh:
我觉得那些机甲应该
不想听我说大融合的故事

translation.en: Then do something else!
translation.zh: 那就做点别的什么

translation.en: [Arin] Up here! You, garbage can!
translation.zh: 看上面 说你呢 垃圾桶

translation.en: [security robots] Dance! Dance! Dance!
translation.zh: 跳舞 跳舞

translation.en: Dance! Dance! Dance!
translation.zh: 跳舞

translation.en: I will never get over how quickly you can hack stuff like that.
translation.zh:
我真搞不懂你怎么能这么快
就黑进系统里去

translation.en: What can I say? I'm just naturally good at tech stuff.
translation.zh: 有什么奇怪的？ 我天生就擅长和机械打交道

translation.en: It's been like that since I was a kid.
translation.zh: 我从小就这样

translation.en: We might not have money,
translation.zh: 虽然我们没什么钱

translation.en: but I'm sure the owners of this place would love
translation.zh: 但我相信这地方的主人

translation.en: one of my delicious homemade pies, right?
translation.zh: 一定会喜欢我做的美味馅饼的对吗？

translation.en: As payment for the gear we're "borrowing."
translation.zh: 就当我们〝借用〞这些零件的补偿吧

translation.en: Who doesn't love pie?
translation.zh: 谁不喜欢吃馅饼呢？

translation.en: [security robots] Dance! Dance! Dance!
translation.zh: 跳舞

translation.en: -[Sora] Hey, Mrs. R. -How's the wasp milk today?
translation.zh:
-嘿 R夫人
-今天过得怎么样？

translation.en: Ooh, watch your step, Newt.
translation.zh: 小心看路 纽特

translation.en: [Sora] Hey! Watch where you're going!
translation.zh: 嘿 看着点路好吗？

translation.en: [Arin] I still can't get over how amazing the Kingdom of Imperium looks.
translation.zh:
看了这么久 我还是会被
至高帝国的繁华景象震撼到

translation.en: It's perfect, isn't it?
translation.zh: 它简直完美 对吧？

translation.en: Don't believe everything you hear about Imperium.
translation.zh: 不要相信关于帝国的任何传言

translation.en: I'm from there, remember?
translation.zh: 我就是从那儿来的 记得吗？

translation.en: Their idea of "perfect" isn't mine.
translation.zh: 他们所谓的完美我并不认同

translation.en: The Merge slamming it up against Ninjago gave me the perfect chance to get out.
translation.zh:
那次和忍者王国的大融合
终于让我有机会逃了出来

translation.en: And the perfect chance to meet me.
translation.zh: 也让你有机会认识了我

translation.en: I'd still like to go there someday.
translation.zh: 以后我还是想去那儿看看

translation.en: Or go anywhere.
translation.zh: 也想去别的地方

translation.en: I've never been out of my old neighborhood.
translation.zh: 我从没离开过以前的家园

translation.en: Crossroads just grew up around the area where my house used to be.
translation.zh:
交叉口就是在我家原来的地方
发展起来的

translation.en: You want to experience other places? Look around!
translation.zh:
你是想去别的地方体验一下？
看看这四周

translation.en: [Sora] Why go anywhere when the best of all the realms
translation.zh: 干嘛还要去别的地方呢？ 所有国度最棒的人都来交叉口住下了

translation.en: have moved here to the Crossroads?
translation.zh: 所有国度最棒的人都来交叉口住下了

translation.en: For example, me.
translation.zh: 就比如说我

translation.en: I'm glad you came here, Sora.
translation.zh: 很高兴你能来 索拉

translation.en: You're my BFF, my fam, but...
translation.zh: 你是我最好的朋友、家人

translation.en: some of us are only here because we had nowhere else to go.
translation.zh:
只是有些人待在这里
是因为他们无处可去

translation.en: I understand, but you have to admit,
translation.zh: 我理解 可是 你必须得承认

translation.en: having our own penthouse is pretty cool.
translation.zh: 能拥有自己的顶层公寓真是棒极了

translation.en: Race you to the top!
translation.zh: 比比谁先到

translation.en: [Arin] Last one there's a rotten egg!
translation.zh: 知道绳子的作用了吧

translation.en: -Hey, that's cheating! -See you!
translation.zh:
-嘿 你这是耍赖
-一会儿见

translation.en: -Wouldn't wanna be you! -Careful, Arin,
translation.zh: 我可不想这么慢 小心点 阿林 你速度太...

translation.en: -you're going too... -[clatters in distance]
translation.zh: 小心点 阿林 你速度太...

translation.en: -[Arin] Dang it! -...fast.
translation.zh: 快了

translation.en: Yes! SA-Mark-1 is gonna crush in the Mech-Master 5,000!
translation.zh:
太好了 索阿马克一号 一定会在机械大师五千大赛上
大杀四方

translation.en: Tomorrow's race is the biggest prize pot of all time.
translation.zh: 明天的比赛奖金是有史以来最高的

translation.en: -If we win... -When we win.
translation.zh: 要是我们赢了... 等我们赢了...

translation.en: [Arin] Right, right, when we win,
translation.zh: 没错 等我们赢了

translation.en: we could find ourselves a real place to live.
translation.zh: 我们就能找个真正的房子住下来

translation.en: I could build my own Monastery and invite everyone else
translation.zh:
我可以亲手打造一个道场 然后邀请其他所有失去父母的人
和我们一起住

translation.en: who lost their parents to live with us.
translation.zh:
然后邀请其他所有失去父母的人
和我们一起住

translation.en: To carry on the tradition of the Ninja!
translation.zh: 将忍者们的传统发扬光大

translation.en: And I could design a real garage and lab.
translation.zh:
那我可以设计一个
真正的车库和实验室

translation.en: And we wouldn't have to pay for parts with your pies anymore.
translation.zh:
而且我们再也不需要
你做馅饼去交换零件了

translation.en: [sighs] Another earthquake? It seems like they're happening more often.
translation.zh: 怎么又地震了？最近总是发生地震

translation.en: They never happened at all before the Merge.
translation.zh: 大融合之前从没地震过

translation.en: Hey, do you ever wonder if there's a greater purpose
translation.zh:
嘿 你有没有想过
这背后可能隐含着某种使命？

translation.en: for all of this? Like, a reason for the Merge?
translation.zh:
嘿 你有没有想过
这背后可能隐含着某种使命？ 大融合也许是有原因的？

translation.en: The Merge might have taken away everything you had, Arin,
translation.zh: 大融合或许夺走了你的一切 阿林

translation.en: but it's given me everything I have.
translation.zh: 但是它也给了我一切

translation.en: Change can be scary.
translation.zh: 改变虽然令人害怕

translation.en: But it's also a chance for something better.
translation.zh: 但它也给了我们变得更好的机会

translation.en: The capture was successful?
translation.zh: 抓捕行动成功了吗？

translation.en: Of course! Transfer will begin first thing in the morning.
translation.zh: 当然 明天一早我们就安排转移

translation.en: Your overconfidence is a weakness, Rapton.
translation.zh: 傲慢自大是你的弱点 莱普敦

translation.en: These creatures are dangerous.
translation.zh: 那些生物非常危险

translation.en: Trust me, this thing isn't going anywhere.
translation.zh: 相信我 这家伙哪儿也别想逃

translation.en: Don't worry, Lord Ras.
translation.zh: 不必担心 拉斯大人

translation.en: Do not disappoint me.
translation.zh: 这一次别让我失望

translation.en: [claw 1] Lord Ras doesn't sound like he's got a lot of faith in us.
translation.zh: 拉斯大人好像不太相信我们的能力

translation.en: He's too uptight.
translation.zh: 他这人太紧张了

translation.en: We're the best there is at rounding up these animals.
translation.zh: 追捕那些野兽 没有谁比我们更在行

translation.en: [in mocking voice] "Ugh, your overconfidence is a weakness."
translation.zh: 〝傲慢自大是你的弱点〞

translation.en: [laughs] Let me tell you,
translation.zh: 让我告诉你

translation.en: I've never even heard the word "weakness."
translation.zh:
我的字典里
从来就没有〝弱点〞这两个字

translation.en: [claw 1] Really? It's a pretty common word.
translation.zh: 是吗？这两个字字典里有啊

translation.en: No. I...
translation.zh: 不 我是说

translation.en: I mean, I just don't know what that word means.
translation.zh: 我根本不知道它们的意思

translation.en: [claw 1] Seriously? I... I can explain.
translation.zh: 真的吗？这个我知道

translation.en: Weakness, noun, the quality of...
translation.zh: 弱点 名词 是用来形容...

translation.en: -[grunts] -Go away.
translation.zh: 滚开

translation.en: This guy in here? He ain't goin' nowhere, ain't ya?
translation.zh:
那家伙在这儿吧？
别想从这个地方跑掉

translation.en: The last call to register for the Mech-Master 5000!
translation.zh: 最后一次报名机会 快来参加机械大师五千

translation.en: The greatest race...
translation.zh: 这是最伟大的比赛

translation.en: [Sora] In the history of the Crossroads. And we're here to win it!
translation.zh:
是交叉口历史上最伟大的比赛
我们是来赢大奖的

translation.en: Sora! Arin!
translation.zh: 索拉 阿林

translation.en: Always happy to peep you two wild scamps.
translation.zh: 每次看到你们两个小坏蛋 我都很开心

translation.en: Up top!
translation.zh: 击个掌

translation.en: Good to see you too, Mr. Frohicky.
translation.zh: 我也很开心 弗洛希齐先生

translation.en: Wait. That's your mech?
translation.zh: 等一下 这是你的机甲？

translation.en: [chuckles] No offense, Sora, but, uh,
translation.zh: 无意冒犯 索拉 不过这和你以前的水准有点差距啊

translation.en: not one of your more impressive builds, is it, hmm?
translation.zh: 不过这和你以前的水准有点差距啊 是吧？

translation.en: It's easily underestimated. Just like us.
translation.zh: 别看样子普通 它可是很厉害的 就和我们一样

translation.en: Sure, but I've got top mechs
translation.zh:
我信 不过这里聚集了
融合国度里最顶尖的机甲

translation.en: from around the merged realms here.
translation.zh:
不过这里聚集了
融合国度里最顶尖的机甲

translation.en: Like an Underworld Mech. Freaky Leapy.
translation.zh: 比如地下世界机甲 恐怖里皮

translation.en: There's even a... uh, uh... [splutters]
translation.zh: 甚至还有...

translation.en: ...that thing.
translation.zh: 那个玩意

translation.en: [Lobbo] Lobbo-lobbo.
translation.zh: 洛博

translation.en: Oh, that's Lobbo! He's a good guy.
translation.zh: 那是洛博 他人很好的

translation.en: But, uh, never ask him about his mom.
translation.zh: 只是千万不要提到他妈妈

translation.en: It's a... it's a very touchy subject.
translation.zh: 那会让他非常伤感

translation.en: Plus, all the regulars.
translation.zh: 还有就是那些普通的了

translation.en: It could get pretty vicious.
translation.zh: 比赛可能很危险哦

translation.en: Maybe you should sit today's race out?
translation.zh: 我看你们今天还是别参加了

translation.en: [sighs] Fine. Then ante up!
translation.zh: 好吧 那就交钱吧

translation.en: I know you're not trying to pay your registration fees
translation.zh:
你们该不会又想
烘个馅饼给我当报名费

translation.en: with baked goods again.
translation.zh: 来蒙混过关吧？

translation.en: So you don't want a fresh pie
translation.zh: 所以你不想来块新鲜出炉的馅饼吗？

translation.en: filled with roasted snow-berries from the Never-Realm?
translation.zh:
这里填满了
从不归国度摘来的雪果唷

translation.en: Fine. I guess we'll just have to toss it.
translation.zh: 好吧 看来我们只能把它扔掉了

translation.en: Maybe the dogs are hungry. Or maybe the raccoons?
translation.zh: 让流浪狗饱餐一顿 或是被浣熊吃掉

translation.en: Well, it'd be a shame to just throw it out.
translation.zh: 这么美味的馅饼 扔掉就...

translation.en: Fine. [laughs]
translation.zh: 太可惜了

translation.en: Line up.
translation.zh: 去排队吧

translation.en: Ha! They'll let anyone into these races, won't they?
translation.zh: 看来随便什么人都可以参加比赛 不像话

translation.en: At least we build our own gear, Kreel.
translation.zh: 至少这是我们亲手打造的 克里尔

translation.en: We don't have a team of servants doing the work for us.
translation.zh: 我们可没有一群仆人替我们工作

translation.en: They aren't servants! They're friend-ish people
translation.zh: 他们不是仆人 他们都是朋友 只是也为我工作而已

translation.en: who work for me.
translation.zh: 只是也为我工作而已

translation.en: They're here to cheer when I crush you! Like last time.
translation.zh: 等我碾碎你 他们会为我欢呼的

translation.en: And the time before, and, checks notes...
translation.zh: 就像上次那样 上上次也一样

translation.en: [gasps] Every single time. You kids don't learn.
translation.zh:
每次都是一样的结果
你们就是不长记性

translation.en: Oh, we learn. But we just don't give up.
translation.zh: 我们记得 我们只是不放弃

translation.en: And I might've designed a bit of an upgrade since the last race.
translation.zh:
上次比赛之后
我还进行了一次全新的升级

translation.en: Come on, Arin. Let's get our fuel couplings attached
translation.zh: 走吧 阿林 我们去把燃油联轴器接上

translation.en: while Kreel contemplates her impending loss.
translation.zh: 让克里尔继续幻想自己失败的样子吧

translation.en: I'm not worried. [whispers] But just in case,
translation.zh: 我才不担心呢 不过以防万一

translation.en: loosen their cooling cable while they're gone.
translation.zh: 等他们一走就去把制冷电缆拧松

translation.en: When they hit their turboboost, their engine will overheat and explode. [evil laugh]
translation.zh:
一旦启动涡轮
他们的引擎就会因为过热而爆炸

translation.en: Hey! Settle down in there!
translation.zh: 嘿 里面给我消停点

translation.en: Nice try, you animal. You can't...
translation.zh: 想得美 你这头野兽 你别想...

translation.en: After that thing!
translation.zh: 快把它给我抓回来

translation.en: Are we winning? I can't see.
translation.zh: 我们要赢了吗？ 我看不见 快说〝我们要赢了〞

translation.en: Tell me we are winning!
translation.zh: 我看不见 快说〝我们要赢了〞

translation.en: Not yet. Get the bumper arms up.
translation.zh: 还没有 把保险臂抬起来

translation.en: [Lobbo] Lobbo on the move. Lobbo-lobbo!
translation.zh: 洛博向前进 洛博

translation.en: We're coming for you, you fancy hatted ego-maniac.
translation.zh:
我们来了 你这个头戴高帽
损人利己的自大狂

translation.en: Hold on!
translation.zh: 坐稳了

translation.en: [Lobbo] Lobbo avoids hazards. Lobbo-lobbo.
translation.zh: 洛博避开危险 洛博

translation.en: Hit the turboboost!
translation.zh: 启动涡轮加速

translation.en: No! We can only use it once!
translation.zh: 不 我们只能用一次

translation.en: Saving it for when we really need it.
translation.zh: 等我们真正需要的时候再用

translation.en: Those punks? Oh, no, they don't.
translation.zh: 他们领先了？他们别想继续嚣张

translation.en: We're in the straightaway.
translation.zh: 进入最后的直线冲刺了

translation.en: This has got to be the time to use the turboboost, right?
translation.zh: 现在该使用涡轮加速了 对吧？

translation.en: -Right? -Yep!
translation.zh: 没错 赢了以后就去领奖金

translation.en: Get ready to roll around in prize money,
translation.zh: 没错 赢了以后就去领奖金 然后把它们扔到空中 大喊...

translation.en: tossing it in the air and going "Whee-hee!"
translation.zh: 然后把它们扔到空中 大喊...

translation.en: Sora, go! We're so close!
translation.zh: 索拉 快走 我们就快到了

translation.en: We gotta go after that dragon.
translation.zh: 我们得去追那条龙

translation.en: What? We need to win this race!
translation.zh: 什么？我们要赢得这场比赛

translation.en: Those dragon hunters are the Claws of Imperium!
translation.zh: 那些神龙猎手是帝国派来的爪牙

translation.en: If they catch that dragon... [groans]
translation.zh: 要是他们抓到了那只龙

translation.en: ...the things they'll do to him. [gasps]
translation.zh: 后果将会不堪设想

translation.en: Trust me, we have to stop them.
translation.zh: 相信我 我们必须阻止他们

translation.en: [Sora] Arin! What would the Ninja do?
translation.zh: 阿林 忍者会怎么做？

translation.en: Let's save that dragon.
translation.zh: 我们去救那条龙

translation.en: -[grunts] Get up! Get up! -[Lobbo] Lobbo-lobbo.
translation.zh: 起来 快起来 洛博

translation.en: Lobbo wins!
translation.zh: 洛博赢了

translation.en: Lobbo a success. See, Lobbo's mother?
translation.zh: 洛博是第一 洛博的妈妈 快看啊

translation.en: Can a "malfunctioning tin can" do that?
translation.zh: 洛博是第一 洛博的妈妈 快看啊 还敢说我是〝有毛病的破铁罐〞？

translation.en: Lobbo-lobbo.
translation.zh: 洛博

translation.en: No need to tell Ras about this minor slip up, understood?
translation.zh:
这点小失误没必要告诉拉斯大人
知道了没有？

translation.en: [Arin] Hop on, buddy!
translation.zh: 快上来 伙计

translation.en: What? Who are these kids now? Get them!
translation.zh:
什么？那两个孩子
从哪儿冒出来的？抓住他们

translation.en: [Arin chuckles nervously] Uh, looks like we're in another race.
translation.zh: 看来新的比赛开始了

translation.en: Then good thing we've still got that turboboost ready to go.
translation.zh: 好在这次我们可以用上涡轮加速了

translation.en: -[Arin grunts] -[Sora] Arin...
translation.zh: 阿尤

translation.en: Uh, did one of us make that thing explode?
translation.zh: 刚才的爆炸是我们的人弄出来的

translation.en: I mean... [chuckles] I'm sure it was us, right?
translation.zh: 不用说 一定是我们干的 对吧？

translation.en: [Rapton] Dragons are resilient.
translation.zh: 龙的生命力很强

translation.en: Our target will survive.
translation.zh: 我们能活着就不错

translation.en: Those kids, not so much.
translation.zh: 那两个孩子可就凶多吉少了

translation.en: Let's get down there and drag the lizard off the pavement.
translation.zh: 我们到下面去 把那只爬虫拖走

translation.en: [claw 1] That's different than it was before, right?
translation.zh: 这和我们之前看到的不太一样 是吧？

translation.en: [Arin] How did you do all this?
translation.zh: 你是怎么变得这么厉害的？

translation.en: I honestly do not know.
translation.zh: 我真不知道是怎么回事

translation.en: But now's not the time for questions.
translation.zh: 但现在不是讨论这个的时候

translation.en: It's the time for...
translation.zh: 我们必须去...

translation.en: Now it's my turn!
translation.zh: 现在该我出手了

translation.en: Self-trained Wannabe Ninja without a master, go!
translation.zh: 没有师父自学成才的预备忍者出击

translation.en: Oh. Close enough.
translation.zh: 挺像样的

translation.en: Lord Ras, we were just about to...
translation.zh: 拉斯大人 我们正要去收拾...

translation.en: You failed me. I do not like that.
translation.zh: 你让我失望了 我讨厌这种感觉

translation.en: [Arin] Uh, do you know who this guy is?
translation.zh: 你知道这家伙是谁吗？

translation.en: -[Sora] No clue. -He doesn't seem very nice.
translation.zh:
-完全没印象
-我看他不像什么好人

translation.en: What? How'd you...
translation.zh: 什么？你是怎么...

translation.en: Arin!
translation.zh: 阿林

translation.en: You are just the first.
translation.zh: 你只是第一个

translation.en: Now, I'm going to hunt down your entire family.
translation.zh: 现在我要把你整个家族全部抓住

translation.en: Wherever they are.
translation.zh: 无论它们在哪儿

translation.en: Put the prisoners on the train. Quickly!
translation.zh: 把囚犯押上车 快点

translation.en: I trust you won't have any more problems.
translation.zh: 我相信你应该不会再有什么问题了吧

translation.en: Yes, Lord Ras. I mean, no, Lord Ras.
translation.zh: 没问题 拉斯大人 我是说 没问题 拉斯大人

translation.en: What do you think they'll do to us?
translation.zh: 他们会怎么对付我们？

translation.en: Whatever it is, they'll do worse to that dragon.
translation.zh: 无论是什么 那条龙的处境会更糟

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: The Claws of the Imperium come from Imperium,
translation.zh: 这些爪牙全部都是从帝国来的

translation.en: same as me.
translation.zh: 就和我一样

translation.en: And Imperium runs entirely on dragon power.
translation.zh: 帝国之所以能运转 全都靠的是神龙的能量

translation.en: With all these merged realms,
translation.zh: 现在那么多国度融合在一起

translation.en: I'm sure they're hunting dragons everywhere now.
translation.zh: 我想他们一定在到处追捕神龙

translation.en: But they say dragon power is safe.
translation.zh: 不过我听说神龙能量是安全的

translation.en: Safe for who? You saw the look in that dragon's eyes.
translation.zh: 对谁安全？你看到那条龙的眼神了

translation.en: It wanted to be free. Just like I did.
translation.zh: 它想要获得自由 就像我一样

translation.en: So, uh, I've known you for a while now,
translation.zh: 那么我认识你也有段时间了

translation.en: and you've always been pretty good with tech, but...
translation.zh: 你对机械一直都很在行 但从没...

translation.en: I have no idea.
translation.zh: 我也不知道是怎么了

translation.en: You turned pieces of the SA-Mark-1
translation.zh: 你刚刚把索阿马克一号的碎片

translation.en: into a flying mech, in midair!
translation.zh:
拼成了一台会飞的机甲
还是在半空中

translation.en: Yeah. That was weird, right?
translation.zh: 没错 确实是很奇怪 是吧？

translation.en: Well, that's one word for it.
translation.zh: 这么形容当然也没错

translation.en: Other words would be amazing,
translation.zh: 但也可以说是难以置信的奇迹

translation.en: impossible, defying all logic or reason!
translation.zh: 但也可以说是难以置信的奇迹 没法用任何逻辑和道理来解释

translation.en: It was that dragon.
translation.zh: 是因为那条龙

translation.en: I could feel it awaken something in me.
translation.zh:
我能感觉到
它唤醒了我身体里的一部分

translation.en: Some kind of power.
translation.zh: 仿佛是某种能量

translation.en: Like the Elemental Powers the Ninja had!
translation.zh: 就像是忍者们拥有的元素能量

translation.en: Powers I've dreamed of having.
translation.zh: 那是我梦寐以求的能量

translation.en: Water, fire, ice.
translation.zh: 水、火 还有冰

translation.en: Not everything is tied to your lost heroes, you know.
translation.zh: 不是什么事都跟你失踪的英雄有关 理智点

translation.en: If I lose hope that the Ninja could come back,
translation.zh: 如果忍者们再也没有回来的希望

translation.en: then I lose hope my parents could come back.
translation.zh: 那我父母就更没有希望了

translation.en: Hope is the only thing the Merge didn't take from me.
translation.zh:
希望是大融合
唯一没从我身上夺走的东西

translation.en: Well, hope won't be enough anymore.
translation.zh: 好吧 现在只有希望是不够的

translation.en: We can't build you a new Ninja Monastery from an Imperium prison.
translation.zh:
我们也没办法在帝国监狱里
给你造个新的忍者道场

translation.en: It's called the "Monastery of Spinjitzu."
translation.zh: 那叫做〝幻影旋转术道场〞

translation.en: But you're right. The dream's over, isn't it?
translation.zh: 不过你说得对 我也该从梦里醒来了

translation.en: [claw 2] Wait. Aren't you... No way!
translation.zh: 慢着 你难道是...不可能

translation.en: The Green Ninja.
translation.zh: 绿色忍者？

translation.en: I think that mask belongs to me.
translation.zh: 我想你手里的面罩应该是我的
